oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Miss Mary Hall interview : MTSC wedding
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hall, Mary
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Bullen, Bob, interviewer; Nunley, Joe, commentator
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Mary Hall shares the story of an "unusual" event that happened to her dorm while she was the Dean of Women. One of the "girls" was getting married, so Hall and the residents in the dorm put together a wedding, which was held in the Student Union
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Hall, Mary Ella, 1895-1991; Weddings; Weddings--Planning; Marriage service; College buildings; Middle Tennessee State College
